name: Lonely Star-Spinner
description:
Created for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2017.

Press any key to spin. Defend yourself against the oncoming waves...er, wave, of enemies...uh, single enemy, and its devastating attacks...um, slow-burn kamikaze dive.

Look, the weapon changes color! Look, the spin attack has some kind of after-image...thing! Rejoice at all the fun you could be having with the game mechanics these effects hint at, if only game jams weren't so bitterly, bitterly short!

Well, you can at least play bouncy-ball with the enemy. That's kinda fun. See how long a chain you can sustain! (Just don't expect the game to track it for you—who has that kind of time?)

Refresh the page to restart. Yeah, we're classing this place up.
